localrss.description: Implant RSS into the bootloader so that it can be installed online

acpid2.description: ACPI Daemon v2 that handles power button events

addincards.description: Remove the model restrictions on official Add-in cards and update usb.map.

boot-wait.description: This script-only extension ensures boot process waits until boot device (`/dev/synoboot`) is available before other processes start launching

codecpatch.description: This patch enables transcoding on Synologys DiskStation Manager 6+ without a valid serial number, by wirgen

console.description: Give a screen console via framebuffer

cpuinfo.description: Adds correct CPU Info, from FOXBI

disks.description: Customized processing Device tree binary with *cfgport parameter

early-telnet.description: Simple extension which starts telnet early at boot

eudev.description: eudev + kmod will assist with auto module loading

hdddb.description: Add HDDs/SSDs drives to your dsm's databases, from 007revad

i915le10th.description: Automatically replace the device ID of i915.ko, only supporting less 10th. (apollolake, geminilake)

lsiutil.description: A tool for working with some LSI RAID controller

nvmecache.description: Enable M2 cache of DS918+,DS1019+,DS1621xs+ (need reboot once)

powersched.description: Utility to configure RTC according to DSM power schedule

setrootpw.description: Enable root permissions for ssh/sftp. Please modify PW="" to the required password in the DSM scheduled task and execute it.

wol.description: Force enable the Wake-on-lan on first ethernet device
